heading: Today
text: Variable clouds, with scattered morning snow showers north, more numerous in NY, with a few brief, heavier squalls, spreading south in the afternoon. A dusting to 2 inches. Early highs in the 20s north, falling through the teens, and 30s south, falling through the 20s. Winds becoming northwest 10 to 15 mph, gusting 25 to 35 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Partly cloudy in the evening, then clearing and much colder. Lows 5 below to 5 above zero, near 10 below in the cold spots north. Northwest winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph, decreasing after midnight.

heading: Friday
text: Sunshine, mixing with periods of clouds. Cold. Highs in the teens to near 20 north, low to mid 20s south. Winds light, becoming south near 10 mph west of the Green Mountains.
